text: palisa tinnunnavar pisac badha nimittam marinnuvilunnavan elunnelkkunnat pealeyallate elunnelkkukayilla. kaccavatavum palisa pealettanneyan enn avar parannatinre phalamatre at‌. ennal kaccavatam allahu anuvadikkukayum palisa nisid'dhamakkukayuman ceytittullat‌. atinal allahuvinre upadesam vannukittiyitt (atanusaricc‌) vallavanum (palisayil ninn‌) viramiccal avan mump vanniyat avannullat tanne. avanre karyam allahuvinre tirumanattinn vidheyamayirikkukayum ceyyum. ini arenkilum (palisayitapatukalilekk tanne) matannukayanenkil avaratre narakavakasikal. avaratil nityavasikalayirikkum
